element-type.name: actionListener
element-type.description: Register an ActionListener instance on the UIComponent associated with the closest parent UIComponent custom action.

attribute-type.name: type
attribute-type.description: Fully qualified Java class name of an ActionListener to be created and registered.

attribute-type.name: binding
attribute-type.description: Value binding expression that evaluates to an object that implements javax.faces.event.ActionListener.

element-type.name: attribute
element-type.description: Add an attribute to the UIComponent associated with the closest parent UIComponent custom action.

attribute-type.name: name
attribute-type.description: The name of the component attribute to be set.

attribute-type.name: value
attribute-type.description: The value of the component attribute to be set.

element-type.name: convertDateTime
element-type.description: Register a DateTimeConverter instance on the UIComponent associated with the closest parent UIComponent custom action.

attribute-type.name: dateStyle
attribute-type.description: Predefined formatting style which determines how the date component of a date string is to be formatted and parsed. Applied only if type is "date" or "both". Valid values are "default", "short", "medium", "long", and "full". Default value is "default".

attribute-type.name: locale
attribute-type.description: Locale whose predefined styles for dates and times are used during formatting or parsing. If not specified, the Locale returned by FacesContext.getViewRoot().getLocale() will be used. Value must be either a VB expression that evaluates to a java.util.Locale instance, or a String that is valid to pass as the first argument to the constructor java.util.Locale(String language, String country). The empty string is passed as the second argument.

attribute-type.name: pattern
attribute-type.description: Custom formatting pattern which determines how the date/time string should be formatted and parsed.

attribute-type.name: timeStyle
attribute-type.description: Predefined formatting style which determines how the time component of a date string is to be formatted and parsed. Applied only if type is "time" or "both". Valid values are "default", "short", "medium", "long", and "full". Default value is "default".

attribute-type.name: timeZone
attribute-type.description: Time zone in which to interpret any time information in the date String. Value must be either a VB expression that evaluates to a java.util.TimeZone instance, or a String that is a timezone ID as described in the javadocs for java.util.TimeZone.getTimeZone().

attribute-type.name: type
attribute-type.description: Specifies what contents the string value will be formatted to include, or parsed expecting. Valid values are "date", "time", and "both". Default value is "date".

attribute-type.name: binding
attribute-type.description: A ValueExpression that evaluates to an instance of javax.faces.convert.DateTimeConverter.

element-type.name: convertNumber
element-type.description: Register a NumberConverter instance on the UIComponent associated with the closest parent UIComponent custom action.

attribute-type.name: currencyCode
attribute-type.description: ISO 4217 currency code, applied only when formatting currencies.

attribute-type.name: currencySymbol
attribute-type.description: Currency symbol, applied only when formatting currencies.

attribute-type.name: groupingUsed
attribute-type.description: Flag specifying whether formatted output will contain grouping separators. Expressions must evaluate to a boolean. Default value is true.

attribute-type.name: integerOnly
attribute-type.description: Flag specifying whether only the integer part of the value will be formatted and parsed. Expressions must evaluate to a boolean. Default value is false.

attribute-type.name: locale
attribute-type.description: Locale whose predefined styles for numbers are used during formatting and parsing. If not specified, the Locale returned by FacesContext.getViewRoot().getLocale() will be used. Expressions must evaluate to a java.util.Locale.

attribute-type.name: maxFractionDigits
attribute-type.description: Maximum number of digits that will be formatted in the fractional portion of the output. Expressions must evaluate to an int.

attribute-type.name: maxIntegerDigits
attribute-type.description: Maximum number of digits that will be formatted in the integer portion of the output. Expressions must evaluate to an int.

attribute-type.name: minFractionDigits
attribute-type.description: Minimum number of digits that will be formatted in the fractional portion of the output. Expressions must evaluate to an int.

attribute-type.name: minIntegerDigits
attribute-type.description: Minimum number of digits that will be formatted in the integer portion of the output. Expressions must evaluate to an int.

attribute-type.name: pattern
attribute-type.description: Custom formatting pattern which determins how the number string should be formatted and parsed.

attribute-type.name: type
attribute-type.description: Specifies how the number string will be formatted and parsed. Valid values are "number", "currency", and "percent". Default value is "number".

attribute-type.name: binding
attribute-type.description: A ValueExpression that evaluates to an instance of javax.faces.convert.NumberConverter.

element-type.name: converter
element-type.description: Register a named Converter instance on the UIComponent associated with the closest parent UIComponent custom action.

attribute-type.name: converterId
attribute-type.description: Converter identifier of the Converter instance to be created and registered.

attribute-type.name: binding
attribute-type.description: A ValueExpression that evaluates to an object that implements javax.faces.convert.Converter.

element-type.name: facet
element-type.description: Register a named facet on the UIComponent associated with the closest parent UIComponent custom action.

attribute-type.name: name
attribute-type.description: Name of the facet to be created.

element-type.name: loadBundle
element-type.description: Load a resource bundle localized for the Locale of the current view, and expose it as a java.util.Map in the request attributes of the current request under the key specified by the value of the "var" attribute of this tag. The Map must behave such that if a get() call is made for a key that does not exist in the Map, the literal string ???KEY??? is returned from the Map, where KEY is the key being looked up in the Map, instead of a MissingResourceException being thrown. If the ResourceBundle does not exist, a JspException must be thrown.

attribute-type.name: basename
attribute-type.description: Base name of the resource bundle to be loaded.

attribute-type.name: var
attribute-type.description: Name of a request scope attribute under which the resource bundle will be exposed as a Map.

element-type.name: param
element-type.description: Add a child UIParameter component to the UIComponent associated with the closed parent UIComponent custom action.

attribute-type.name: binding
attribute-type.description: ValueExpression to a backing bean property bound to the component instance for the UIComponent created by this custom action.

attribute-type.name: id
attribute-type.description: Component identifier of the UIParameter component to be created.

attribute-type.name: name
attribute-type.description: Name of the parameter to be created.

attribute-type.name: value
attribute-type.description: Value of the parameter to be set.

element-type.name: phaseListener
element-type.description: Register a PhaseListener instance on the UIViewRoot in which this tag is nested.

attribute-type.name: type
attribute-type.description: Fully qualified Java class name of an PhaseListener to be created and registered.

attribute-type.name: binding
attribute-type.description: Value binding expression that evaluates to an object that implements javax.faces.event.PhaseListener.

element-type.name: selectItem
element-type.description: Add a child UISelectItem component to the UIComponent associated with the closed parent UIComponent custom action.

attribute-type.name: binding
attribute-type.description: Value binding expression to a backing bean property bound to the component instance for the UIComponent created by this custom action.

attribute-type.name: id
attribute-type.description: Component identifier of the UISelectItem component to be created.

attribute-type.name: itemDescription
attribute-type.description: Description of this option, for use in development tools.

attribute-type.name: itemDisabled
attribute-type.description: Flag indicating whether the option created by this component is disabled. Expressions must evaluate to a boolean. Default value is false.

attribute-type.name: itemLabel
attribute-type.description: Label to be displayed to the user for this option.

attribute-type.name: escape
attribute-type.description: Flag indicating that characters that are sensitive in the value of the itemLabel attribute must be escaped. This flag is set to "true" by default.

attribute-type.name: itemValue
attribute-type.description: Value to be returned to the server if this option is selected by the user.

attribute-type.name: value
attribute-type.description: Value binding expression pointing at a SelectItem instance containing the information for this option.

element-type.name: selectItems
element-type.description: Add a child UISelectItems component to the UIComponent associated with the closed parent UIComponent custom action.

attribute-type.name: binding
attribute-type.description: Value binding expression to a backing bean property bound to the component instance for the UIComponent created by this custom action.

attribute-type.name: id
attribute-type.description: Component identifier of the UISelectItems component to be created.

attribute-type.name: value
attribute-type.description: Value binding expression pointing at a List or array of SelectItem instances containing the information for these options.

element-type.name: setPropertyActionListener
element-type.description:
Register an ActionListener instance on the UIComponent associated with the closest parent UIComponent custom action. This actionListener will cause the value given by the "value" attribute to be set into the ValueExpression given by the "target" attribute.

The implementation of this tag creates a special ActionListener instance and registers it on the ActionSource associated with our most immediate surrounding instance of a tag whose implementation class is a subclass of UIComponentTag. This tag creates no output to the page currently being created.

The ActionListener instance created and installed by this tag has the following behavior and contract.

  • Only create and register the ActionListener instance the first time the component for this tag is created
  • The "target" and "value" tag attributes are ValueExpression instances and are stored unevaluated as instance variables of the listener.
  • When the listener executes, call getValue() on the "value" ValueExpression. Pass the result to a call to setValue() on the "target" ValueExpression

This tag creates no output to the page currently being created. It is used solely for the side effect of ActionListener creation.

attribute-type.name: value
attribute-type.description: ValueExpression to be stored as the value of the target attribute.

attribute-type.name: target
attribute-type.description: ValueExpression that is the destination of the value attribute.

element-type.name: subview
element-type.description: Container action for all JavaServer Faces core and custom component actions used on a nested page via "jsp:include" or any custom action that dynamically includes another page from the same web application, such as JSTL's "c:import".

attribute-type.name: binding
attribute-type.description: Value binding expression to a backing bean property bound to the component instance for the UIComponent created by this custom action.

attribute-type.name: id
attribute-type.description: Component identifier of the UINamingContainer component to be created.

attribute-type.name: rendered
attribute-type.description: Flag indicating whether this component (and its children) should be rendered. Expressions must evaluate to a boolean.

element-type.name: validateDoubleRange
element-type.description: Register a DoubleRangeValidator instance on the UIComponent associated with the closest parent UIComponent custom action.

attribute-type.name: maximum
attribute-type.description: Maximum value allowed for this component.

attribute-type.name: minimum
attribute-type.description: Minimum value allowed for this component.

attribute-type.name: binding
attribute-type.description: A ValueExpression that evaluates to an instance of DoubleRangeValidator.

element-type.name: validateLength
element-type.description: Register a LengthValidator instance on the UIComponent associated with the closest parent UIComponent custom action.

attribute-type.name: maximum
attribute-type.description: Maximum length allowed for this component.

attribute-type.name: minimum
attribute-type.description: Minimum length allowed for this component.

attribute-type.name: binding
attribute-type.description: A ValueExpression that evaluates to an instance of LenghtValidator.

element-type.name: validateLongRange
element-type.description: Register a LongRangeValidator instance on the UIComponent associated with the closest parent UIComponent custom action.

attribute-type.name: maximum
attribute-type.description: Maximum value allowed for this component.

attribute-type.name: minimum
attribute-type.description: Minimum value allowed for this component.

attribute-type.name: binding
attribute-type.description: A ValueExpression that evaluates to an instance of LongRangeValidator.

element-type.name: validator
element-type.description: Register a named Validator instance on the UIComponent associated with the closest parent UIComponent custom action.

attribute-type.name: validatorId
attribute-type.description: Validator identifier of the Validator to be created and registered.

attribute-type.name: binding
attribute-type.description: A ValueExpression that evaluates to an object that implements the javax.faces.validator.Validator interface.

element-type.name: valueChangeListener
element-type.description: Register an ValueChangeListener instance on the UIComponent associated with the closest parent UIComponent custom action.

attribute-type.name: type
attribute-type.description: Fully qualified Java class name of a ValueChangeListener to be created and registered.

attribute-type.name: binding
attribute-type.description: Value binding expression that evaluates to an object that implements javax.faces.event.ValueChangeListener.

element-type.name: verbatim
element-type.description: Create and register a child UIOutput component associated with the closest parent UIComponent custom action, which renders nested body content.

attribute-type.name: escape
attribute-type.description: Flag indicating that generated markup must be escaped in a manner that is appropriate for the markup language to be rendered. Expressions must evaluate to a boolean. Default value is false.

attribute-type.name: rendered
attribute-type.description: Flag indicating whether or not this component should be rendered (during Render Response Phase), or processed on any subsequent form submit. The default value for this property is true.

element-type.name: view
element-type.description: Container for all JavaServer Faces core and custom component actions used on a page.

attribute-type.name: locale
attribute-type.description: Locale to use for localizing this page. Expressions must evaluate to a java.util.Locale or to a String that is converted to a Locale.

attribute-type.name: renderKitId
attribute-type.description: Identifier for the RenderKit to use for rendering this page.

attribute-type.name: beforePhase
attribute-type.description: MethodBinding pointing to a method that takes a javax.faces.event.PhaseEvent and returns void. This method will be called before every phase except for restore view.

attribute-type.name: afterPhase
attribute-type.description: MethodBinding pointing to a method that takes a javax.faces.event.PhaseEvent and returns void. This method will be called after every phase except for restore view.
